body:
### Welcome to the Campus Factory

The official documentation is found on the [OSG Twiki](https://www.opensciencegrid.org/bin/view/Documentation/CampusFactoryInstall).  

Further, the overall design of the Campus Factory is highlighted in Derek Weitzel's (@djw8605) [thesis](http://digitalcommons.unl.edu/computerscidiss/21/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Campus-factory
tagline: A Condor overlay generator for PBS clusters.
